forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 20 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 52. Southwest wind 10 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco this afternoon, the sun makes a fleeting appearance, casting its subtle light on an otherwise mostly cloudy sky. The air carries a refreshing bite as winds pick up, stirring the city with a touch of vigor. A high of around 60 degrees is tempered by a cool breeze from the west-southwest, creating an invigorating atmosphere ideal for a leisurely stroll along the waterfront or through the bustling streets. Though the forecast hints at temperatures dipping to a mild 52 degrees tonight, this tranquil afternoon remains inviting for those who appreciate the crispness of spring air.

As the day transitions into evening, clouds will gather, wrapping the city in a gentle embrace, possibly hinting at the presence of the elusive marine layer somewhere just beyond the horizon. For such an occasion, light layers work well—a comfortable sweater or light jacket should suffice against the chill that may set in as dusk approaches. To appreciate the calm before nightfall, one might find joy in a quiet moment at a café or exploring the diverse art scene nearby, using the time to connect with the city's vibrant pulse as it begins to wind down for the day.
